about_the_game:
In this version of the game the first two missions are available.
In case you purchase a full version of the game, the progress achieved in this version will be saved.

A nurse and a security officer working at the hospital are trying to escape from the city invaded by Zombie girls.
New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

  • the game is based on Dead Souls mechanics.
  • this DLC will help to bind XXZ game to your account.
  • 10 missions.

name: XXZ: Rush Trial

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 1024MB)

short_description: A nurse and a security officer working at the hospital are trying to escape from the city invaded by Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
